# Installing IBM API Connect in OpenShift Container Platform

Pre-Requisite:
1 . An OCP cluster with version 4.12.7 (Preferably, 3 master nodes with 8v CPU and 16GB RAM and 3 worker nodes with 16v CPU and 32GB RAM) 

2 . Permissions to install and configure software in the OCP cluster 

3 . IBMid for obtaining entitlement key. 










[OpenShift Roles and permissions](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/cloud-paks/cp-integration/2023.4?topic=administering-openshift-roles-permissions)

Two roles are required for Cloud Pak for Integration:

A cluster administrator is assigned the cluster-admin role.

A namespace admin is assigned the admin role in a specific namespace (project).



1 . [Installing operators](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/cloud-paks/cp-integration/2023.4?topic=operators-installing-by-using-cli#installing-cli)

2 . [Validating installation of an operator ](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/cloud-paks/cp-integration/2023.4?topic=operators-installing-by-using-cli#validating-cli__title__1)


# Finding and applying your entitlement key by using the CLI 

[Obtaining your entitlement key](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/cloud-paks/cp-integration/2023.4?topic=fayekoi-finding-applying-your-entitlement-key-by-using-cli-online-installation#obtaining-your-entitlement-key__title__1)

# Applying the pull secret

[Adding a global pull secret for all namespaces](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/cloud-paks/cp-integration/2023.4?topic=fayekoi-finding-applying-your-entitlement-key-by-using-cli-online-installation#applying-pull-secret__add_global_pull_secret__title__1)


# Adding a pull secret to a namespace using the CLI






```bash
  oc create secret docker-registry ibm-entitlement-key \
    --docker-username=cp \
    --docker-password=entitlement_key \
    --docker-server=cp.icr.io \
    --namespace=target_namespace
```
# Deploying the platform UI 

1 . [Deploying the Platform UI by using the OpenShift console](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/cloud-paks/cp-integration/2023.4?topic=ui-deploying-platform-by-using-openshift-console)

2 . [Deploying the Platform UI by using the CLI](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/cloud-paks/cp-integration/2023.4?topic=ui-deploying-platform-by-using-cli)
